references.paper_title: Phi-3 technical report: A highly capable language model locally on your phone
references.reason: This paper introduces a highly capable language model used for fine-tuning in the experiments, representing a significant advancement in multimodal language models.

references.paper_title: Mind2Web: Towards a generalist agent for the web
references.reason: This paper introduces Mind2Web, a benchmark dataset used for evaluating the performance of Explorer, representing a key dataset for web agent research.

references.paper_title: AgentTrek: Agent trajectory synthesis via guiding replay with web tutorials
references.reason: This paper presents AgentTrek, a method for generating web trajectories that is compared to the approach used in this paper, providing a relevant comparison to existing techniques.

references.paper_title: SeeClick: Harnessing GUI grounding for advanced visual GUI agents
references.reason: This paper introduces SeeClick, another relevant method that leverages visual grounding for GUI agents, providing a basis for comparison of techniques.

references.paper_title: OSWorld: Benchmarking multimodal agents for open-ended tasks in real computer environments
references.reason: This paper introduces OSWorld, a benchmark dataset that provides a comparison point for the capabilities of the proposed system.
